meanings.def: the activity or habit of smoking cigarettes, etc.
examples: No Smoking (= for example, on a notice)
Smoking is not allowed in this theatre.
He's trying to give up smoking.
the harmful effects of cigarette smoking
Your GP can provide advice on smoking cessation.
the introduction of the smoking ban in pubs, restaurants, and hotels
The campaign aims to reduce teen smoking.
The company has a strict no smoking policy.
The doctor advised me to cut down on smoking and alcohol.
a study of the harmful effects of smoking
